text: Yeroo sheyxaanni dalagaa isaanii (gadhee) miidhagsee, “har’a nama irraa injifataan isiniif hin jiruAnis gargaaraa keessan” jedheen san [yaadadhu]Yeroma gareen lamaan wal argan, of duuba deebi’ee “Dhugumatti, ani isin irraa qulqulluudha; ani waan isin hin agarren argaa jiraAni Rabbiinin sodaadhaRabbiin adabbiin Isaa cimaadha” jedhe
